review: Great value; best price was from Amazon.com & it arrived in two days with free Prime shipping. High quality, sturdy binders that will last a very long time. Easy to close & open, interior pockets to store additional documents & see-through plastic sliders on the front, back & spine to label each binder. 5*
productTitle: Cardinal Round Ring View Binder, 3-Inch, White, Pack of 4 Binders (00430)
